Instance.description: An interaction that is a mouthpiece for a different sims PlayAudio interaction.

Tunable.name: audio_stop_event
Tunable.description: The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to stop the music and vocals.

TunableEnum.name: mouthpiece_target
TunableEnum.description: The participant of mine that owning music interaction must target as its mouthpiece target. e.g. if we are targeting the sim running the music interaction their mouthpiece target would be actor, our mouthpiece target would be targetsim. If all of us are targeting a certain object then both would be object.
